entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -46

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
